title: Move to Pittsburgh
body: I studied Industrial Design at Carnegie Mellon University in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.

title: Graduate work at the University of Maryland
body: In 2007, I moved back to Maryland from Pittsburgh to begin graduate work in the Applied Anthropology program at the University of Maryland, College Park.

title: Begin work at Baltimore Heritage
body: I started working as a Field Officer at Baltimore Heritage in October 2009 thanks to the National Trust for Historic Preservation Partners in the Field grant program.

title: Move to Baltimore
body: After a a month of commuting up I-95 from Silver Spring to work, I knew I wanted to move to Baltimore. Heavy snow on the day of our move made it a bit difficult.
